page.title: 09Transport - Traffic Survey 1
page.content:
M6 Motorway Southbound 24/6/81 26/6/85 %increase _______ _______ _________ Cars 328 850 159%up Lorries 264 325 23%up Coaches 18 8 56%down Vans 66 120 82%up Motor bikes 6 4 33%down Caravans 10 N/A
26/6/85 _______ At 2:05 to 2:35 we were at the motorway bridge counting different kinds of vehicles. There were two people for each kind of vehicle e.g. two to count cars and so on. When we arrived back at the class we counted the results, then found the average for each kind of vehicle.
For 24/6/81 see page 10
